page.title: 09TYLDESLEY FESTIVAL
page.content: EVERY YEAR{TYLDESLEY}HOLDS A{FESTIVAL {WEEK.}THIS YEAR IT WAS BETWEEN THE {19TH AND 25TH OF MAY.}IT BEGAN WITH A {FUN RUN.}THE RUNNERS FINISHED AT THE RUGBY CLUB WHERE THERE WERE REFRESHMENTS AND STALLS.LATER THERE WAS A CHILDREN'S{PET SHOW}AND AN EXHIBITION OF MARTIAL ARTS.THE SECOND DAY HAD DARTS COMPETITIONS FOR LADIES AND MEN.THERE ALSO WAS A WATER POLO MATCH HELD AT{TYLDESLEY BATHS}FOR UNDER 20 YEARS OF AGE.ON THE 21ST OF MAY THERE WAS A{SEDAN CHAIR RACE}ROUND THE TOWN.THERE WERE FIVE TEAMS.A TALLEST AND STRAIGHTEST FLAG POLE COMPETITION AND WINDOW DRESSING WAS JUDGED. A PLAY CALLED{'A CURE FOR {LOVE'}WAS PERFORMED BY TYLDESLEY LITTLE THEATRE PLAYERS. HORWICH MORRIS MEN PERFORMED ON THE MARKET SQUARE AND IN OTHER LOCAL PLACES.
